name: Turn (itch) (IamNOTaCAT)
description:
Kill or be killed, you have only one turn!  Use your abilities to defeat your enemies, but be sure to defeat them all before your turn is over because you have only one life.

This game was made for the GMTK game jam 2019 with the theme:  only one

Feedback is appreciated!

Having problem running the game? Try chrome, doesn't work? Download and run in windows.
